name: dockflare
description: DockFlare is a simple web-based UI for managing and monitoring Docker containers. It displays container logs, stats, and actions via an intuitive dashboard suited for homelab users and container enthusiasts.
features: Container Monitoring: View status and stats in real-time. Complete visibility.
Log Viewing: Access container logs through web interface. Easy troubleshooting.
Container Actions: Start, stop, and restart containers easily. Simple management.
Intuitive Dashboard: Clean UI designed for homelab users. User-friendly experience.
Resource Stats: Monitor CPU, memory, and network usage. Performance insights.
Self-Hosted: Manage your containers from your own dashboard. Complete control.
